page.title: 20Hobbies,Bradford
page.content:
We decided to conduct a survey of all the children in our school to find out what activities they enjoyed in their spare time.These are our findings.The most popular hobby was swimming.Football was the next most popular,closely followed by snooker. Music lessons,judo ,karate ,cubs ,dancing ,gymnastics and cricket were also enjoyed by many boys and girls. Only 2 boys were members of the Boys Brigade and one child was interested in first aid.
The Domesday Project survey of this block was conducted by the following schools:-Middle Schools -Hutton and Thorpe;First Schools -Our Lady & St. Brendan's RC,Bolton Lane,Grove House and St.Anthony's RC.Thanks to all staff and pupils concerned.
